snippet.title: Biggest ever BBL announced
snippet.content: THE Big Bash League will be bigger than ever this summer, with the competition expanded from 32 regular season matches to 40. The fixture lists for both BBL 07 and the Women's Big Bash League were released on Monday, with WBBL 03 kicking off on December 9 and the men's competition beginning on December 19 with a Sydney Smash clash between the Thunder and the Sixers. Both tournaments will finish on February 4. The expanded season means each BBL 07 side will play 10 games during the regular season, up from the eight they played last summer. Each side will also receive an additional home match. Take a look at the fixtures below. BIG BASH LEAGUE Sydney Thunder v Sydney Sixers, Spotless Stadium, December 19, 7:40pm Brisbane Heat v Melbourne Stars, Gabba, December 20, 6:40pm Hobart Hurricanes v Melbourne Renegades, Blundstone Arena, December 21, 7:40pm Adelaide Strikers v Sydney Thunder, Adelaide Oval, December 22, 7:10pm Sydney Sixers v Perth Scorchers, SCG, December 23, 4:10pm Melbourne Renegades v Brisbane Heat, Etihad, December 23, 7:20pm Perth Scorchers v Melbourne Stars, WACA, December 26, 4:10pm Brisbane Heat v Sydney Thunder, Gabba, December 27, 6:10pm Sydney Sixers v Adelaide Strikers, SCG, December 28, 7:10pm
